entry.name: icon
entry.label: The name of the icon to use for the compact representation (e.g. on a small panel).

entry.name: useCustomButtonImage
entry.label: Whether to use a custom image instead of an icon in the compact representation (e.g. on a small panel).

entry.name: customButtonImage
entry.label: The URL of the custtom image to use instead of an icon in the compact representation (e.g. on a small panel).

entry.name: activationIndicator
entry.label: Shows an indicator underneath the launcher's icon when the launcher is opened.

entry.name: fullHeight
entry.label: Fill the full screen height with the launcher.

entry.name: launcherPosition
entry.label: Where is the launcher supposed to open? 1: Auto (Bottom or Top panel) 2: Bottom or top center 3: Screen center

entry.name: floating
entry.label: Gives the launcher some breathing room.

entry.name: useExtraRunners
entry.label: Whether to use additional KRunner plugins to produce results in the search.

entry.name: extraRunners
entry.label: The plugin id's of additional KRunner plugins to use. Only used if useExtraRunners is true.
